src:
Wishnutama-Angela Segera Keliling 5 Destinasi Super Prioritas
05 Nov 2019, 21:34 by Afif Farhan


Candi Borobudur, salah satu dari 5 destinasi super prioritas. (Foto: Moi Ismiy/d'Traveler)

FOKUS BERITA
Duet Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta - Ada 5 Destinasi Super Prioritas yang sedang digarap pemerintah. Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama dan wakilnya, Angela Tanoesoedibjo, akan segera mendatangi kelimanya."Kita sekarang baru dikasih laporan saja. Dalam waktu dekat, kita akan berkeliling dan melihat," ujar Wishnutama dalam acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019).5 Destinasi Super Prioritas tersebut yakni Labuan Bajo, Danau Toba, Mandalika, Borobudur, dan Likupang. Pembangunan infrastruktur dan fasilitas penunjang pariwisata serta sumber daya manusianya pun dikebut."Kita sudah melihat progress dan infrastruktur, tapi kami harus ke sana untuk memastikan apa yang dibutuhkan dan apa tantangannya," tegas Wishnutama.Wishnutama mengaku siap menggarap event wisata termasuk tentu di 5 Destinasi Super Prioritas. Pun menurutnya, tiap daerah punya potensi wisata atau daya tarik masing-masing."Setelah kami keliling nanti, barulah kami akan lihat apa yang akan kami lakukan," tutupnya.Simak Video "Kembangkan 5 Destinasi Wisata Prioritas, Wishnutama Ingin Libatkan YouTuber"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/krs)
FOKUS BERITA

Duet Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe
text:
Wishnutama-Angela Get Around 5 Super Priority Destinations
05 Nov 2019, 21:34 by Afif Farhan


Borobudur Temple, one of 5 super priority destinations. (Photo: Moi Ismiy / d'Traveler)

NEWS FOCUS
Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta Duet - There are 5 Super Priority Destinations that are being worked on by the government. Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama and his deputy, Angela Tanoesoedibjo, will soon be coming to the five. "We are only given a report now. In the near future, we will go around and see," Wishnutama said in the Coffee Cup with Mas Tama and Mbak Angela Angela held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019). 5 The Super Priority Destinations are Labuan Bajo, Lake Toba, Mandalika, Borobudur, and Likupang. "We have seen progress and infrastructure, but we have to go there to ascertain what is needed and what are the challenges," said Wishnutama .ishnutama said he was ready to work on tourism events including of course at 5 destinations Super Priority. Even according to him, each region has its own tourism potential or attraction. "After we tour later, then we will see what we will do," he concluded. Watch Video "Develop 5 Priority Travel Destinations, Wishnutama Wants to Involve YouTubers" : 20sec video] (aff / krs)
NEWS FOCUS

Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe duet
